name: Disney.com
description:
Created features and experiences across domestic & international Disney portfolio of sites

Agile software development within Sinatra/Backbone architecture

Refactored codebase to minimize code bloat and page load times, and increase general standards and legibility

Defined and created the CSS coding standards and style guide that was distributed to all devs

Transition wireframes into code for prototypes and production, incorporating interactivity, animated elements, and fluid responsive states

2015 Webby Award Honoree:Youth Website

images.caption: An answer/reveal module with configurable text, images, custom dynamic transitions for the "reveal" state (such as push, fade, and flip), and triggered to play on hover or click. Can be used for jokes and basic Q&ampA

An interactive flexible grid with configurable sprite animations that are triggered on hover or on page load, optional links, and designed to responsively resize to distribute objects in multiple rows. If there are an odd number of objects, the grid compensates fill 100% of the row width
